description: Returns all stack related events for a specified stack in reverse chronological order. For more information about a stack's event history, see Understand CloudFormation stack creation events in the CloudFormation User Guide.

parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name or the unique stack ID that's associated with the stack, which aren't always interchangeable: Running stacks: You can specify either the stack's name or its unique stack ID. Deleted stacks: You must specify the unique stack ID.

nested_items.name: StackEvents
nested_items.description: A list of StackEvents structures.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The unique ID name of the instance of the stack.

nested_items.name: EventId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of this event.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name associated with a stack.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The name or unique identifier associated with the physical instance of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Type of resource. For more information, see Amazon Web Services resource and property types reference in the CloudFormation User Guide.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: Time the status was updated.

nested_items.name: ResourceStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceStatusReason
nested_items.description: Success/failure message associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceProperties
nested_items.description: BLOB of the properties used to create the resource.

nested_items.name: ClientRequestToken
nested_items.description: The token passed to the operation that generated this event.

nested_items.name: HookType
nested_items.description: The name of the hook.

nested_items.name: HookStatus
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the change set hook.

nested_items.name: HookStatusReason
nested_items.description: Provides the reason for the hook status.

nested_items.name: HookInvocationPoint
nested_items.description: Invocation points are points in provisioning logic where Hooks are initiated.

nested_items.name: HookFailureMode
nested_items.description: Specify the hook failure mode for non-compliant resources in the followings ways.
FAIL Stops provisioning resources.
WARN Allows provisioning to continue with a warning message.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatus
nested_items.description: An optional field containing information about the detailed status of the stack event.
CONFIGURATION_COMPLETE - all of the resources in the stack have reached that event. For more information, see Understand CloudFormation stack creation events in the CloudFormation User Guide.
VALIDATION_FAILED - template validation failed because of invalid properties in the template. The ResourceStatusReason field shows what properties are defined incorrectly.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the output exceeds 1 MB in size, a string that identifies the next page of events. If no additional page exists, this value is null.
